channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft Stops Windows Updates—Turn Your PC Into A Chromebook
item.description: Why you should quit Windows for a Chromebook.

item.title: Coalition Urges Cities To Tackle Climate-Related Health Threats
item.description: A new report warns cities are at the forefront of a global health crisis exacerbated by climate change, and calls for a reimagined approach to health ...

item.title: How Small Businesses Are Really Using AI
item.description: Many small businesses use AI, but mostly as part of existing software or as a glorified search engine rather than as a game-changing new system.

item.title: Increasing the dosage
item.description: If you’re taking the wrong medication, that’s not going to help. It doesn’t matter how fast you’re going if you’re headed in the wrong direction.

item.title: Before we learn a new skill
item.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.
